description: Header file defining a mock class for IOCIContainer interface in a C++ testing framework, utilizing Google Mock. It includes mock methods for container management and notification interfaces, serving as a test stub or mock object.

classes.name: OCIContainerMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the IOCIContainer interface for unit testing, utilizing Google Mock for method behavior specification.

classes.name: IOCIContainerNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the INotification interface for container event notifications in tests.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of a notification callback.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: ListContainers
methods.description: Mocks listing of current containers.

methods.name: GetContainerInfo
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of detailed container information.

methods.name: GetContainerState
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of the current state of a container.

methods.name: StartContainer
methods.description: Mocks starting a container with specified parameters.

methods.name: StartContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Mocks starting a container from a Dobby specification.

methods.name: StopContainer
methods.description: Mocks stopping a container.

methods.name: PauseContainer
methods.description: Mocks pausing a container.

methods.name: ResumeContainer
methods.description: Mocks resuming a paused container.

methods.name: HibernateContainer
methods.description: Mocks hibernating a container.

methods.name: WakeupContainer
methods.description: Mocks waking up a container from hibernation.

methods.name: ExecuteCommand
methods.description: Mocks executing a command inside a container.

methods.name: Annotate
methods.description: Mocks adding an annotation to a container.

methods.name: RemoveAnnotation
methods.description: Mocks removing an annotation from a container.

methods.name: Mount
methods.description: Mocks mounting a filesystem into a container.

methods.name: Unmount
methods.description: Mocks unmounting a filesystem from a container.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Mocks incrementing reference count.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Mocks decrementing reference count.

methods.name: QueryInterface
methods.description: Mocks querying for specific interface implementations.
